SEARCH
Package boundary

Class StudentUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.StudentUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class StudentUI extends Object implements UserInterface
Boundary class that exposes the student console menu for toggling visibility, browsing/applying to opportunities, viewing applications, accepting offers, and requesting withdrawals, along with filter management.

Business logic is delegated to ApplicationService, OpportunityService, and related repositories; this class focuses on user interaction.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentUI

      public StudentUI(Student student, ApplicationService appSvc, OpportunityService oppSvc, AuthService authSvc, ApplicationRepository appRepo, OpportunityRepository oppRepo, RequestRepository reqRepo, UserRepository userRepo, FileImporter importer, InputHelper input)
      Constructs a StudentUI instance with all required services and repositories.
      Parameters:
      student - the currently logged-in student
      appSvc - the service for managing internship applications
      oppSvc - the service for retrieving and filtering opportunities
      authSvc - the authentication service
      appRepo - the repository for storing and retrieving applications
      oppRepo - the repository for storing and retrieving opportunities
      reqRepo - the repository for storing withdrawal requests
      input - helper class for validated console input

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the main student menu loop. Handles visibility toggling, viewing opportunities, applying, checking applications, accepting offers, requesting withdrawal, and adjusting filters.
      Specified by:
      start in interface UserInterface
